DHP.Settings.ExperimentalFeatures.Name: Experimental Features
DHP.Settings.ExperimentalFeatures.Hint: Enable experimental features that are still in development. These features may not work properly and are provided for testing purposes only.
DHP.Settings.ExperimentalFeatures.FearTr: Enables a fear tracker UI that displays above the hotbar. The tracker integrates with the Daggerheart system to show and modify the current fear level.
DHP.Settings.ExperimentalFeatures.TokenC: Enables the token counters UI (HP, Hope, Stress, Armor) displayed near the hotbar for the currently selected token.
DHP.Settings.SheetSize.Width.Name: Default DH+ Sheet Width (px)
DHP.Settings.SheetSize.Width.Hint: Default width applied to DH+ actor sheets (Character, Adversary, Companion, Environment). Reopen sheets to apply if not updated automatically.
DHP.Settings.SheetSize.Height.Name: Default DH+ Sheet Height (px)
DHP.Settings.SheetSize.Height.Hint: Default height applied to DH+ actor sheets (Character, Adversary, Companion, Environment). Reopen sheets to apply if not updated automatically.
DHP.Settings.SheetSize.Adversary.Width.H: Default width applied to DH+ Adversary sheets.
Default height applied to DH+ Adversary sheets.
DHP.Settings.ProgressGradients.HP.Name: HP Bar Gradient (colors)
DHP.Settings.ProgressGradients.HP.Hint: Per-user. Comma/space-separated colors for the HP bar gradient. Example: #fef790, #ffbb33, #ff9800, #f44336. Leave blank for default.
DHP.Settings.ProgressGradients.Stress.Hi: Per-user. Comma/space-separated colors for the Stress bar. Example: #90caf9, #42a5f5, #1e88e5.
DHP.Settings.ProgressGradients.Armor.Hin: Per-user. Comma/space-separated colors for the Armor Slots bar. Example: #c8e6c9, #81c784, #4caf50.
DHP.Settings.HoverDistance.Enable.Name: Enable Hover Distance
DHP.Settings.HoverDistance.Enable.Hint: Show distance between your selected token and any token you hover.
DHP.Settings.HoverDistance.Position.Name: Tooltip Position
DHP.Settings.HoverDistance.Position.Hint: Where to show the distance label relative to the hovered token.
DHP.Settings.HoverDistance.Rounding.Name: Rounding (units)
DHP.Settings.HoverDistance.Rounding.Hint: Round the displayed distance to this step. 0 = floor to integer.
DHP.Settings.EnhancedChat.Enable.Name: Enhanced Chat Styling
DHP.Settings.EnhancedChat.Enable.Hint: Per-user. Enable the DH+ enhanced chat message styling.
DHP.Settings.Particles.Enable.Name: Use Particle Effects
DHP.Settings.Particles.Enable.Hint: Enable particle effects for spellcasting traits, critical hits, and other UI elements.
DHP.Settings.DomainCards.AlwaysOpen.Name: Always Open Domain Card Moves
DHP.Settings.DomainCards.AlwaysOpen.Hint: Always show domain card move descriptions expanded in chat messages.
DHP.Settings.Moves.AlwaysOpen.Name: Always Open Domains & Moves
DHP.Settings.Moves.AlwaysOpen.Hint: Always show domain card and action move descriptions expanded in chat messages.
DHP.Settings.FearTracker.Style.Name: Fear Tracker Display
DHP.Settings.FearTracker.Style.Hint: Choose between the counter or animated progress bar display.
DHP.Settings.TokenEffects.Halo.Name: Token Effects Halo
DHP.Settings.TokenEffects.Halo.Hint: Arrange token effect icons in a circular halo around tokens instead of the default stacked column.
DHP.Settings.TokenEffects.Halo.Size.Name: Halo Icon Size
DHP.Settings.TokenEffects.Halo.Size.Hint: Set the base pixel size for halo-arranged token effect icons.
DHP.Settings.TokenEffects.Halo.Spacing.H: Expand or tighten spacing between halo effect icons.
DHP.Settings.ResourcePips.Name: Pip Display for Resources
DHP.Settings.ResourcePips.Hint: Display HP, Stress, and Armor as clickable pips instead of progress bars on all actor sheets. Similar to the party member display.
